title: Impact of orthophosphate on the solubility and properties of lead orthophosphate nanoparticles
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, 10,1623-1636
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00152D, Paper
Casey L. Formal, Darren A. Lytle, Stephen Harmon, David G. Wahman, Michael K. DeSantis, Min Tang
Orthophosphate reduces lead solubility by forming small hydroxypyromorphite, Pb5(PO4)3OH, particles.
